title: Drawer slides
content:
LET US HELP YOU FIND THE PERFECT MOVEMENT SOLUTION

Our team is ready to help you find your perfect movement solution.

PREMIUM DRAWER SLIDES AND SLIDING SOLUTIONS MANUFACTURER

From electronic enclosure slides to integrated locking slides, we manufacture slides to fit your movement solution needs.

Intagration locking solutions

LIGHT DUTY (139 LB. OR LESS)

LIGHT DUTY (139 LB. OR LESS)

UNDERMOUNT

HEAVY DUTY (139 LB. OR LESS)

MEDIUM DUTY (139 LB. OR LESS)

DRAWER SLIDES IN DETAIL

For more than 50 years we’ve worked with architects, designers, and specifiers to develop slide solutions that provide movement, positioning, and access in a vast range of applications across a broad spectrum of industries. In doing this we’ve observed and recorded some factors that need to be considered when designing with Accuride slides.

learn more
Mounting

Mounting

For optimal performance, we recommend you mount slides only as indicated in the provided technical sheet. Although most slides are side mounted, some can be flat mounted under the drawer or moving component, causing a 50 percent loss in load rating.

Side Space

Drawers 24 in. [610 mm] wide or less: Accuride 7434 (7432, full extension) all ball bearing slide, with rail mount, full extension + 1 in. [25 mm] over travel, hold-in detent, 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating, and progressive movement.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
  • Optional finish: black zinc

Drawers 30 in. [762 mm] wide or less: Accuride 3132EC Eclipse, fully concealed under-mount slide with ball bearing and polymer rollers, with lever disconnect, full extension, soft-closing action, and 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
Load

Drawers 24 in. [610 mm] wide or less: Accuride 7434 (7432, full extension) all ball bearing slide, with rail mount, full extension + 1 in. [25 mm] over travel, hold-in detent, 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating, and progressive movement.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
Extension

Drawers 24 in. [610 mm] wide or less: Accuride 7434 (7432, full extension) all ball bearing slide, with rail mount, full extension + 1 in. [25 mm] over travel, hold-in detent, 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating, and progressive movement.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
  • Optional finish: black zinc

Drawers 30 in. [762 mm] wide or less: Accuride 3132EC Eclipse, fully concealed under-mount slide with ball bearing and polymer rollers, with lever disconnect, full extension, soft-closing action, and 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

SPECIAL FEATURES

Accuride offers a host of special features that improve design and functionality in your application.

Touch-Release

Just a slight push inward and the slide latch releases, propelling the drawer open 2”.

3832TR, 3832HDTR

See More...

Easy-Close

Bring drawers to a smooth, gentle close every time with our patented Easy-Close feature.

3832EC, 3160EC, 3135EC, 115RC, 3600EC (OEM Only)

See More...

Detent-Out

Firmly holds drawers and pull-out surfaces in extended positions

3832DO, 2109, Keyboard Tray Systems

See More...

Lock-In/Lock-Out

Keeps drawers, trays, and panels secured in closed and open positions for prolonged access.

9308E

See More...

Lock-Out

Locks drawers and other pull-out surfaces in extended position until released by a lever.

2907WB, 340, 3307, 9307

See More...
